rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Set Payout Date on Oppty to Ensure accurate Payment Allocation

Flow.description: Allocate Payments to Drawdowns. Also cleans up allocations when Payment changes to non payment type

value.stringValue: AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR ( isNew(), NOT(IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE(([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c )),"Payment")), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Amount__c), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Date__c), [Drawdown__c].Allocate_Payment__c ) )

AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR ( isNew(), NOT(IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE(([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c )),"Payment")), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Amount__c), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Date__c), [Drawdown__c].Allocate_Payment__c ) )

OR (AND( NOT(IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment")), IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ),"Payment") ), AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR ( NOT(IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE(([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c)),"Payment")), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Amount__c), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Date__c), [Drawdown__c].Allocate_Payment__c ) ) )

OR (AND( NOT(IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment")), IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ),"Payment") ), AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR ( NOT(IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE(([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c)),"Payment")), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Amount__c), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Date__c), [Drawdown__c].Allocate_Payment__c ) ) )

AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR( Not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Interest_Rate__c)), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Compounding_Frequency__c )), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Interest_Deferral_Period__c)), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Minimum_Interest_Period__c)), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Payout_Date__c)) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( IsPickVal({!myVariable_current.Payment_Method__c} ,"Payment"), OR( Not(isblank( {!myVariable_current.Interest_Rate__c})), not(isblank( {!myVariable_current.Compounding_Frequency__c} )), not(isblank( {!myVariable_current.Interest_Deferral_Period__c})), not(isblank( {!myVariable_current.Minimum_Interest_Period__c})), not(isblank( {!myVariable_current.Payout_Date__c})) ) )

value.stringValue: AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR( Not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Interest_Rate__c)), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Compounding_Frequency__c )), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Interest_Deferral_Period__c)), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Minimum_Interest_Period__c)), not(isblank( [Drawdown__c].Payout_Date__c)) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( IsPickVal({!myVariable_old.Payment_Method__c} ,"Payment"), OR( Not(isblank( {!myVariable_old.Interest_Rate__c})), not(isblank( {!myVariable_old.Compounding_Frequency__c} )), not(isblank( {!myVariable_old.Interest_Deferral_Period__c})), not(isblank( {!myVariable_old.Minimum_Interest_Period__c})), not(isblank( {!myVariable_old.Payout_Date__c})) ) )

value.stringValue: AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR ( isNew(), NOT(IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE(([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c )),"Payment")), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Amount__c), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Date__c), [Drawdown__c].Allocate_Payment__c ) )

AND( IsPickVal([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c ,"Payment"), OR ( isNew(), NOT(IsPickVal(PRIORVALUE(([Drawdown__c].Payment_Method__c )),"Payment")), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Amount__c), isChanged([Drawdown__c].Date__c), [Drawdown__c].Allocate_Payment__c ) )

Flow.label: Drawdown - Allocate Payments

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Payout Date on Oppty - Calcs Interest As of this Date
